monster.Name: Balloon Dog
monster.LostMessage: lets out a continuous cry. You are quickly surrounded by other balloon animals and they grab you. You start to float away to never to be seen again. Game Over.
monster.WinMessage: Quickly you prick the Balloon dog with a needle, and it drops a key. You pick it up.

monster.Name: Cotton Candy Monster
monster.LostMessage: The Cotton Candy Monster did not like that. The Monster grabs you spins you in the cotton candy machine. You are now a Cotton Candy Monster. Game Over.
monster.WinMessage: The Cotton Candy Monster shrivels up and deteriorates into a pink goo. Within the goo there is a key. You pick it up.

name: Popcorn Stand

monster.Name: Popcorn Snake
monster.LostMessage: The Popcorn Snake is not fazed by your actions. It completely wraps around you, and drags you into the popcorn machine. You are now a popcorn snake. Game Over.
monster.WinMessage: You grab the broom and sweep up Popcorn Snake into the trash. It leaves behind a key. You pick it up.

unReachableDirection: a pile of kernels paper bags
